features.name: Kassel
features.text: I was born in Kassel in Germany in 1931, December '31 and my name was Oppenheim. Dorrith Marianne Oppenheim - it's a mouthful

features.name: London
features.text: I arrived in England on the 26th of July 1939 and then my parents had managed to get guardians for me and they met me at Liverpool Street Station

features.name: Birmingham
features.text: And there, you know, my guardian's brother came too, because he spoke German and we went in the car. And we stopped, I think we must have stopped in Birmingham

features.name: Edinburgh
features.text: Well, to begin with I stayed in the, it was a terraced - Stevenson Terrace [Edinburgh]. The district was Balgreen, I stayed there to begin with. But, you know, it was a small flat, it was an upstairs flat and not much room
